alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Searcy and north central Van Buren Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Leslie, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Kay... Woolum... Rocky Hill... Watts... Leslie... Dennard... Canaan... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
